meanings.definition: The property of not being additive.
meanings.sent1: The nonadditivity of the ingredients caused the recipe to fail.
meanings.sent2: The nonadditivity of the colors resulted in a unique painting.
meanings.sent3: The nonadditivity of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete.
meanings.sent4: Her nonadditivity to the team dynamic was like a missing puzzle piece.
meanings.sent5: The nonadditivity of the chemicals created a dangerous reaction.

meanings.definition: The state of not being able to be added together.
meanings.sent1: The nonadditivity of the conflicting opinions led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent2: The nonadditivity of the mismatched socks made finding a pair difficult.
meanings.sent3: The nonadditivity of the jigsaw puzzle pieces made them refuse to fit together.
meanings.sent4: The nonadditivity of their personalities clashed like oil and water.
meanings.sent5: The nonadditivity of the numbers made the math problem unsolvable.
